plot: Shaun O'Donnell sets out to do all of the wild activities that he used to while trying to get back into. Adventures include kayaking, skateboarding, snowboarding, scuba diving, etc.
plot_en: Shaun O'Donnell sets out to do all of the wild activities that he used to while trying to get back into. Adventures include kayaking, skateboarding, snowboarding, scuba diving, etc.
plot_es: Shaun O'Donnell sets out to do all of the wild activities that he used to while trying to get back into. Adventures include kayaking, skateboarding, snowboarding, scuba diving, etc.
title: My Life with Shaun O'Donnell
